menu.name: Korean Pork Belly
menu.description: Grilled pork belly served with a side of kimchi and rice.

menu.name: Bibimbap
menu.description: A bowl of warm rice topped with vegetables, beef, a fried egg, and gochujang sauce.

menu.name: Kimchi Stew
menu.description: A spicy stew made with kimchi, tofu, and pork.

menu.name: Japchae
menu.description: Stir-fried glass noodles with vegetables and beef.

menu.name: Tteokbokki
menu.description: Spicy rice cakes cooked in a sweet and spicy sauce.
